attributes.action: Intervene and help free Palistine citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the americans and british were quickly into Iraq to "HELP" the civilians but where are they now when it is happening in Palistine? why wont they help now is it because the Palistinians have no oil like Iraq?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
